entry.title: English Is Hard, Ok!
entry.summary:
Author: Maccadams_back_booth

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 421Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 19

Summary: The kids and Clark collectively forget the name of a movie in English. They then proceed to fall into chaos trying to remember before Bruce saves the day. Might make more chapters of this if y'all are interested.
